MetaData.Name: IIP IG Cloned from The Interim, Computable HL7 v2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging
MetaData.OrgName: American Immunization Registry Association and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

Predicate.Description: If XTN.2 (Telecommunication Use Code) contain the value 'NET'.
If XTN.2 (Telecommunication Use Code) does not contain the value 'NET'.
If XTN.2 (Telecommunication Use Code) does not contain the value 'NET'.
If HD.2 (Universal ID) is not valued
If HD.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued
If HD.2 (Universal ID) is valued
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued
If CWE.1 (Identifier) is valued
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued
If CX.2 (Check Digit) is valued
If EI.3 (Universal ID) is not valued
If EI.2 (Namespace ID) is not valued
If EI.3 (Universal ID) is valued
If XON.10 (Organization Identifier) is valued
If XON.10 (Organization Identifier) is valued
If XON.1 (Organization Name) is not valued
If XCN.11 (Identifier Check Digit) is valued
If ( XCN.2.1 (Surname) is not valued AND XCN.3 (Given Name) is not valued )
If XCN.1 (ID Number) is valued
If XCN.1 (ID Number) is valued
If ERL.4 (Field Repetition) is valued
If ERL.5 (Component Number) is valued
If ERL.6 (Sub-Component Number) is valued
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '64994-7'.
If OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'NM'.
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. AND The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. )
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. AND The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. )
If RXA-6 (Administered Amount) does not contain the value '999'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain the value 'RE'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA'].
If ( The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. )
If PID-24 (Multiple Birth Indicator) contain the value 'Y'.
If PID-30 (Patient Death Indicator) contain the value 'Y'.
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. AND The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. )

If ( ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. ) AND The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. )
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. AND The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. )

If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain the value 'RE'. )
If RXA-6 (Administered Amount) does not contain the value '999'.
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. )
If RXA-5.1 (Identifier) does not contain the value '998'.
If ( The first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) contain the value '00'. AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain one of the values in the list: ['CP','PA']. )
If OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'NM'.
If PD1-12 (Protection Indicator) is valued
If PD1-16 (Immunization Registry Status) is valued
If PD1-11.1 (Identifier) is valued
If OBX-3.1 (Identifier) contain the value '64994-7'.
If OBX-2 (Value Type) contain the value 'NM'.

Constraint.Description: Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMMDD'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
HD.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
HD.2 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
VID.1 (Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1'.
Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
CQ.2.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'RD'.
CQ.1 (Quantity) shall contain a positive integer.
EI.3 (Universal ID) shall be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
EI.4 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]]+/-ZZZZ'.
Element 'xxx' SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]'.
XPN.7 (Name Type Code) shall contain the value 'M'.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '64994-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: HL70064_IZ.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '30956-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: CVX

If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '69764-9' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: PHVS_VISBarcodes_IIS
OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) shall contain the value 'F'.
OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) shall contain a positive integer.
If RXA-4.1 (Time) is valued then RXA-4.1 (Time) shall be identical to RXA-3.1 (Time)
If RXA-5.1 (Identifier) contain the value '998'. then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.
RXA-1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '0'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not valued or the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued

If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then the value of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: NIP001
If At least one occurrence of RXA-18.1 (Identifier) is valued then RXA-20 (Completion Status) shall contain the value 'RE'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain the value 'RE'. then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.
RXA-2 (Administration Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '1'.
If RXA-4.1 (Time) is valued then RXA-4.1 (Time) shall be identical to RXA-3.1 (Time)
If RXA-5.1 (Identifier) contain the value '998'. then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.

If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then the value of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: NIP001
RXA-1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '0'.
If At least one occurrence of RXA-18.1 (Identifier) is valued then RXA-20 (Completion Status) shall contain the value 'RE'.
If ( RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued AND RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain the value 'RE'. ) then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.
RXA-2 (Administration Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '1'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not valued or the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued
RCP-1 (Query Priority) shall contain the value 'I'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) shall contain the value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1'.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '30956-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: CVX
OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) shall contain the value 'F'.
OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) shall contain a positive integer.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) shall contain the value '1'.
NK1-1 (Set ID - NK1) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
ORC-1 (Order Control) shall contain the value 'RE'.
IN1-1 (Set ID - IN1) shall contain the value '1'.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '64994-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: HL70064_IZ.
If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '30956-7' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: CVX

If The value of OBX-3.1 (Identifier) is '69764-9' and the value of OBX-2 (Value Type) is 'CE' then the value of OBX-5.1 (Observation Value) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: PHVS_VISBarcodes_IIS
OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) shall contain the value 'F'.
OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) shall contain a positive integer.
If RXA-4.1 (Time) is valued then RXA-4.1 (Time) shall be identical to RXA-3.1 (Time)
If RXA-5.1 (Identifier) contain the value '998'. then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.
RXA-1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '0'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not valued or the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is not one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL NOT be valued

If RXA-20 (Completion Status) is valued and the value of RXA-20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA' then the value of RXA-9.1 (Identifier) SHALL be one of codes listed in the Value Set: NIP001
If At least one occurrence of RXA-18.1 (Identifier) is valued then RXA-20 (Completion Status) shall contain the value 'RE'.
If RXA-20 (Completion Status) contain the value 'RE'. then RXA-6 (Administered Amount) shall contain the value '999'.
RXA-2 (Administration Sub-ID Counter) shall contain the value '1'.
ORC-1 (Order Control) shall contain the value 'RE'.
PatientIdentifierList.PID-1 (Set ID - PID) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 is valued '00' and RXA-5.1 is valued with a CVX code from table PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS (See Appendix A) then for each vaccine information statement that was shared there SHALL be:[one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '69764-9' (bar coded) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. Both OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4] OR [one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '30956-7' (vaccine type) and one OBX segment with OBX-3.1 valued '29768-9' (version date) and one OBX with OBX-3.1 valued '29769-7' (presentation or delivery date) associated. All three OBX shall have the same value in OBX-4]

If RXA-20 is valued 'CP' or 'PA' and the first occurrence of RXA-9.1 (Administration Note.code) is '00' then the message SHALL include an OBX segment associated with the RXA with OBX-3.1 shall equal '64994-7'
QPD-1.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z34'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z31'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'RSP'.
QPD-1.3 (Name of Coding System) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'RSP_K11'.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'K11'.
QPD-1.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Request Immunization History'.
All occurrences of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.
QPD-1.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Request Immunization History'.
QPD-1.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z34'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'ER'.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'AL'.
At least one occurrence of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS' (Case Sensitive).
At least one occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z34' (Case Sensitive).
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'QBP_Q11'.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'Q11'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'QBP'.
QPD-1.3 (Name of Coding System) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.
QPD-1.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z44'.
QPD-1.2 (Text) shall contain the value 'Request Evaluated History and Forecast'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'RSP'.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'RSP_K11'.

If At least one occurrence of HISTORY_FORECAST.RXA-20 (Completion Status) contains one of the values in the list: ['NA','RE'] (Case Sensitive). then at least one occurrence of HISTORY_FORECAST.ORC-3.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value '9999' (Case Sensitive).
At least one occurrence of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
QPD-1.3 (Name of Coding System) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.
At least one occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z42'.
The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group

MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'K11'.

At least one occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z23' (Case Sensitive).

( MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'Q11'. OR MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'V04'. )
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'ACK'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'NE'.
The Value of OBX-1 (Set ID-OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value "1" within a message or for each group
At least one occurrence of MSH-21.2 (Namespace ID) shall contain the value 'CDCPHINVS'.

At least one occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z22'.

MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) shall contain the value 'ER'.

If At least one occurrence of ORDER.RXA-20 (Completion Status) contains one of the values in the list: ['NA','RE'] (Case Sensitive). then at least one occurrence of ORDER.ORC-3.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value '9999' (Case Sensitive).

( QPD-1.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z34'. OR QPD-1.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value 'Z44'. )
